welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Manteno, USA! Get ready to explore our quaint town known for its rich history and small-town charm. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
